resources.string: This is an Android Application that allows users to add airlines and flights, and the users can search for flights from a given airline. To add airline and flight navigate to the second item in the navigation bar. To search for flights from a given airline navigate to the third item in the navigation bar. Lastly, the last item is for help.
Home - Contains Greetings and brief explanation of the app
Help - In this tab will be a readme which describe the application and how to use it.
Search - On this tab users will be able to enter in the airline name they want to know the flights to.
Add - On this tab users will be able to enter in required information about airline and flight. Once information has been entered an airline and flight will be created.

Greetings and welcome to my Airline App. In this app, users can add airlines and any associated flights and search for flights that belong to a specific airline. There are four Icons on the navigation bar below. The first icon is the home page, the second is Add the third is Search and lastly, Help. Add is used for adding airlines and flights, search is used for searching airlines, and help is for helpful information.
